name: More Better Ctrl-W
author: more-better-ctrl-w@tallybark.com
description: Close highlighted tabs using custom keybinding, e.g., <Alt-W>. Assign no-op to any keybinding, e.g., <Ctrl-W>. Assign delete back word to custom keybinding, e.g., <Ctrl-W>. Target audience is developers who are used to <Ctrl-W> deleting previous word (what readline calls unix-word-rubout). Source at
